name: European Insulation Manufacturers Association
goal:
Eurima is the European Insulation Manufacturers Association and represents the interests of all
major mineral wool insulation producers throughout Europe. Eurima members employ over 20,000 people
across Europe with the installation of insulation products accounting for an estimated 300,000 manyears.

Eurima does generic scientific research into the fields of product performance, energy efficiency in buildings and sustainable construction on behalf of its members, to be used in generic product and industry communications and to contribute to the European debate.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: EU Climate & Energy Policy, Energy Union, Clean Energy for All Europeans, Energy Efficiency Directive, Energy Performance of Buildings Directive, EU-ETS, Circular Economy, Sustainability Assessment of the Built environment, CPR & CEN-standardisation, Sustainable Construction, Occupational and Product Health & Safety.
